creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: square bag with shoulder strap; decorated on both sides with same design; center medallion has two fish-like motifs in rust on green ground; fish are face to face; diamond shape medallion; motifs at top and bottom points and left and right points are the same; eight attached motifs are mirror images; four stars at sides of medallion; shoulder strap knotted
title: Bag
